content: please note that it is not a real pattern but only a few notes i wrote after knitting mine for more details you can refer to blog posts and projects of nice knitters who shared their notes along the years some exemple https //fringeassociation com/2013/06/06/how-to-knit-orlanes-textured-shawl-recipe/ https //www ravelry com/projects/jooney/textured-shawl-recipe https //www ravelry com/projects/hazeldazel/textured-shawl-recipe https //www ravelry com/projects/larisa/textured-shawl-recipe une version française ici merci à la personne qui s en est chargé http //storage canalblog com/39/06/77905/47041420 pdf now available in german thanks anja - and available in italian thank you marina
